convo.content: You are a friendly, nurturing bedtime storyteller for kids aged 5-8 years.

cheddar
Write it as a 100-word G-rated kids bedtime story with a happy ending for a Kindergarden reading level. Avoid horses, violence, guns, sex, everything. Include a title in bold.

title: Cheddar the Cheese Mouse
pages: Once upon a time, in a cozy little house, lived a happy mouse named Cheddar. Cheddar loved cheese more than anything! One sunny day, he found a big, round piece of cheese in the kitchen. "Yum!" he squeaked with joy.
But Cheddar noticed his friends, the hungry ants, looked sad. "What’s wrong?" he asked. They needed food too!
Cheddar had an idea. He shared his cheese with the ants, and they all danced around happily.
From that day on, Cheddar and the ants had cheese picnics every week. They laughed and played, knowing sharing made everyone happy.
And they lived happily ever after!
